channel.title: Poem on Aruna Mahajan's Poems
channel.description: Recent content in Poem on Aruna Mahajan's Poems

item.title: Nari Shakti
item.description: In the country I was born, There woman’s power is adorned. Laxmi, the bestower of wealth. Durga, the vanquisher of enemies. Sarasvati, the patron of knowledge. And Siddhi-Datri, the angel of harmony. Be exalted the whole year, not just for a day, Maintain your esteem, that’s all I pray. Don’t vilify or trample others to rise, Trust your ability, and soar the skiess. Be honest, be creative, be loved. And live with your head held high.
